CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Make Reservation stage positioned above or below the Book Flight stage?
SRP.A: The Make Reservation stage is positioned {below} the Book Flight stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Travel to Destination?
VE.A: The value of stage Travel to Destination is {1088}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Make Reservation?
VE.A: The value of stage Make Reservation is {1540}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Leave Review?
VE.A: The value of stage Leave Review is {286}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Select Accommodation, with a value of {2410}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Review, with a value of {286}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination?
SC.A: Decreased by {452} Thousand Tourists from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation?
SC.A: Decreased by {450} Thousand Tourists from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Travel to Destination to stage Check-in at Hotel?
SC.A: Decreased by {424} Thousand Tourists from stage Travel to Destination to stage Check-in at Hotel.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2200? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 876? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Check-in at Hotel} stage has {664}, the {Leave Review} stage has {286}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 876 and 1314? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to {Make Reservation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Make Reservation} to stage {Travel to Destination} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Make Reservation} and {Travel to Destination} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Check-in at Hotel} and {Leave Review} stages.
